game.name: KILL IT WITH FIRE! 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Kill It With Fire 2는 최고의 협동 거미 사냥 경험을 제공합니다! 혼자 또는 구제업자 팀을 이루어, 정신 나간 여러 무기들을 총동원해 난장판을 만들고, 거미가 점령한 일곱 개의 차원에서 수십 개의 도전을 완수하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: KILL IT WITH FIRE! 2 is the ultimate co-op spider-hunting experience! Either solo or as a team of Exterminators, unleash an arsenal of crazy weapons, wreak havoc, and complete dozens of challenges across seven dimensions under spider siege.
